page.title: 03The Coal Yard.
page.content: Hendry's coal yard is situated by the river side.The coal comes from differant countries such as Poland, South Africa,China,England and Germany.They use different types of machinery to put the coal into 50kg bags.They use a tractor,hopper,scales and a forklift.There are 5 different types of coal.The dearest,English coal, is Â£7.50 per bag and the cheapest Â£5.56.Polish coal sells best as it is the cheapest.There are different types of coal for different types of fires. The farthest to the south they deliver is Berridale,and to the north is Auckengill.This coal business started in 1983.Before that the coalyard was a building yard. Coalmen wear no special clothing except for a thick warm waist coat which protects their backs from the hard bags of coal.
